com.rey.material.app

Class Dialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Dialog
      • com.rey.material.app.Dialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.DialogInterface, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatePickerDialog, SimpleDialog, TimePickerDialog

    public class Dialog
extends android.app.Dialog
    Created by Rey on 12/10/2014.

        public Dialog canceledOnTouchOutside(boolean cancel)

        cancel - Whether the dialog should be canceled when touched outside
        Returns:
        The Dialog for chaining methods.
